alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Highland; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 11:18AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL FAYETTE, NORTHEASTERN HIGHLAND AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM EDT... At 1118 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Leesburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Leesburg, Bainbridge, North Folk Village, Frankfort, Londonderry, Highland, South Salem, Bourneville, East Monroe, Andersonville, Mooresville, Samantha, Rainsboro, Lattaville, Paint Creek State Park, Summithill and Knockemstiff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
